object.object_description: 19th century portrait of Caterina Cornaro, the last queen of Cyprus.

object_history.history_description: The painting was acquired by a private collector (Michael Zeippekis) who donated it to the Leventis museum.

object_analysis.observed_results: The canvas of the painting was nailed on stretches
object_analysis.generated_results: The painting was cut from a larger one

object_analysis.observed_object: Carlo Ridolfi, Le meraviglie dell'arte, Venice, 1648
object_analysis.observed_results: Titian painted a painting on the same subject
object_analysis.generated_results: The painting is a lost work of Titian
